opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Richard Jimenez v. George J. Beto, Director, Texas Department of Corrections

opinion:
405 U.S. 910

92 S.Ct. 989

30 L.Ed.2d 781

Richard JIMENEZ, petitioner,
v.
George J. BETO, Director, Texas Department of Corrections.

No. 71-5709.

Supreme Court of the United States

February 22, 1972

1

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for Fifth Circuit granted. Judgment vacated and case remanded to the Court of Appeals for further consideration in light of Haines v. Kerner, 404 U.S. 519, 92 S.Ct. 594, 30 L.Ed.2d 652 (1972).

2

For opinion after remand see 468 F.2d 616.
